gym_koori_010_receptionist_02:
Let me register you as a challenger. Your name is
[VAR TRNAME(0000)], yes?
gym_koori_010_receptionist_03:
Great! Now, in order to face Gym Leader
Grusha, you’ll first need to pass the Gym Test.
gym_koori_010_receptionist_04:
Here at the Glaseado Gym, that means doing
the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Snow Slope Run[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
gym_koori_010_receptionist_05:
Ride a Pokémon down the designated course and
try to reach the goal within the time limit!
gym_koori_010_receptionist_06:
To start your test, just head out of the Gym and
go up the slope to your left. We’ll fill you in on\r
the details there!
gym_koori_010_receptionist_07: Now get out there and have fun!
